Banner.Description: I have 5+ years of experience developing systems, interfaces, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am kneen to write clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, JavaScript and jQuery along with good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 5+ years as a developer, I try to learn each day. I have worked writing unit tests, e2e automated tests,performing continuous integration .I have led teams having empathy, motivating team mates, setting plans and implementing the goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Following is on overview of my work experience
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web developer
Description: Developed and maintained web applications according to client briefs and added some exciting features too.
Developed web products by coding wireframes into elements that user can interact with, using Angular.
Worked with UX Designers and backend developers to meet project goals and create effective user experience.
Specified style guides for JavaScript, jQuery, SCSS and Angular to achieve consistent coding practices.
Adding unit test cases for projects having minimum coverage of 80%.
Worked on increasing accessibility presence on pages to more than 90%.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend.
Creating platforms with Angular, Bootstrap, programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Wrote automated test scripts to increase the effectiveness, efficiency and coverage of software testing using Protractor along with Selenium reducing manual testing by 80%
Worked on requirement analysis, logging defects and preparing test reports to maintain a track of project state.
Assisted in the training new developers.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Annotating slides
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Web application to show scanned blood-smear slides on system and helping doctors to annotate the image and classify it various categories.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Testify
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An application to create dynamic tests for students for various subjects

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Plot it on
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An application to pl0t data read from JSON in the form of graph choosen by user from the user

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
